About.desc: I am a junior Front-End developer skilled in the React library. I have experience working with popular frameworks and libraries such as Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Material-UI, and I am proficient in using them to create beautiful and efficient user interfaces. Additionally, am familiar with TypeScript and use it to write stronger and maintainable code. I am passionate about continuing to learn and grow in this industry, and my goal is to create advanced user interfaces and improve the user experience in various projects. I am seeking opportunities to collaborate with creative and innovative teams to enhance my skills and contribute to the success of projects.

Skill.descPage: From Web Components to React.JS, Redux. Check out my latest web software development portfolio projects.

myProject.title: Monitoring Vistham Company
myProject.aboutProject:
The monitoring website was designed and built upon the request of the knowledge-based company, Behesystem. The goal of this project was to replace the company's existing monitoring website to provide better performance and features. I worked on this project as both a designer and front-end developer in a freelance capacity. 
 The main challenges I faced during this project were working with charts, data analysis, and establishing connections with the server. I tackled these challenges by utilizing advanced tools and techniques in web design and development to find appropriate solutions. 
 In the end, this project helped me enhance my skills in front-end design and development and contributed to improving the monitoring performance of Behesystem.
myProject.technicalSheetLabel: Code technologies I got involved with while working on this project.

myProject.title: Task Manager
myProject.projectTitleLabel: Task Manager react TypeScript web application
myProject.aboutProject: Development of a task management program aimed at improving the organization and tracking of tasks for users. This project was carried out in a group with three other individuals under the supervision of a company mentor. The aim of the project was to practice real teamwork and learn collaboration in a professional environment. The program included key features such as creating, editing, deleting, and tracking tasks, as well as designing a user-friendly interface.
myProject.technicalSheetLabel: Code technologies I got involved with while working on this project.
